thread.title: Louisville to Vacate 2013 Men's Basketball National Championship

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Louisville to Vacate 2013 Men's Basketball National Championship
text:
The NCAA Tuesday forced the University of Louisville to vacate its wins from 2011 through 2015—including its 2013 national championship—following a scandal in which a former escort said she had sex with men’s basketball players and recruits for money. 
The unprecedented ruling alters college basketball history, and represents a stunning blow to the university and its storied basketball program, led in recent years until this season Hall of Fame coach Rick Pitino. 
...
